docs.title: Welcome to Vectara RAG SaaS
docs.text: This project creates a secure, multi-tenant RAG service using Vectara + FastAPI + Streamlit.# Welcome to Vectara RAG SaaS

docs.title: System Architecture
docs.text:
• Frontend: Streamlit UI
  • Backend: FastAPI
  • RAG Engine: Vectara
  • Auth: Supabase/Auth0
  • Docs: GitHub Pages (MkDocs)

docs.title: How to Use
docs.text:
1. Upload documents via a dashboard
  2. Ask questions in chat
  3. View responses sourced from your knowledge
